20101207141331.333|20101207141334.667|TR0|mystery....
20101207141334.667|20101207141338.000|TR0|
20101207141338.000|20101207141341.333|TR0|NATO's agreed to beef up its
20101207141341.333|20101207141344.667|TR0|forces in the Baltic as a
20101207141344.667|20101207141348.000|TR0|contingency plan against Russia.
20101207141348.000|20101207141353.000|TR0|The move's been revealed in US
20101207141353.000|20101207141358.000|TR0|diplomatic cables released by
20101207141358.000|20101207141401.333|TR0|WikiLeaks, and show it was
20101207141401.333|20101207141404.667|TR0|secretly signed by Secretary of
20101207141404.667|20101207141408.000|TR0|State Hillary Clinton in January
20101207141408.000|20101207141413.000|TR0|this year....
20101207141413.000|20101207141418.000|TR0|
20101207141418.000|20101207141421.333|TR0|Under the programme, NATO will
20101207141421.333|20101207141424.667|TR0|extend its military presence in
20101207141424.667|20101207141428.000|TR0|Poland and encompass Estonia,
20101207141428.000|20101207141431.333|TR0|Latvia and Lithuania,
20101207141431.333|20101207141434.667|TR0|essentially moving closer to the
20101207141434.667|20101207141438.000|TR0|Russian Border. The forces
20101207141438.000|20101207141443.000|TR0|involved will be American,
20101207141443.000|20101207141448.000|TR0|British, Polish and German. The
20101207141448.000|20101207141451.333|TR0|cables call for the move to be
20101207141451.333|20101207141454.667|TR0|kept secret to avoid "upsetting
20101207141454.667|20101207141458.000|TR0|Russia". The publication comes
20101207141458.000|20101207141503.000|TR0|against the backdrop of a
20101207141503.000|20101207141508.000|TR0|declared "reset" in Russia-NATO
20101207141508.000|20101207141511.333|TR0|relations. For more analysis,
